title: What to eat
creator_credit: Terry Trench, Derek Stewart Productions and Gerard Bryant
brief_description: An outline of the basic principles of nutrition. Diagrams and live action describe the nutritional value of various foods and the requirements of the body for a balanced diet of calories and vitamins. The wide choice of consumer hoods available in Britain today permits a sensible diet for all.
